a pumpkin's harvest

NAME skull
DLG ITM_0

ITM 1
00000000
00000000
00000000

00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
DLG ITM_1

ITM 2
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
DLG ITM_2

DLG SPR_0
I'm a cat

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_1
"""
{clr3}this is the {shk}pumpkin murderer's{shk} wagon... 
{shk}I MUST RUN AWAY!!!!!!{shk}{clr3}
"""

DLG SPR_2
"""
               {clr3}FARM >
      < MARKET{clr3}
"""

DLG SPR_3
{clr3}DANGER!{clr3}

DLG SPR_4
{clr3}          {printItem "skull"}DANGER{printItem "skull"}{clr3}

DLG SPR_5
"""
{clr3}FARM >
< MARKET{clr3}
"""

DLG SPR_6
"""
{cycle
  - {clr3}{shk}I AM NOT GOING BACK TO THE FARM!!{shk}{clr3}
  - {clr3}{shk}ANYTHING ELSE IS BETTER!!{shk}{clr3}
}
"""

DLG SPR_7
"""
{sequence
  - {clr3}PUMPKIN: o-oh hello! did you also run away?
    ONION: ..yeah
    
    PUMPKIN: ...
    
    PUMPKIN: i hope the future generations will never have to deal with this..
    
    ONION: yeah... one of these days i think there will be enough of us and we will fight and win our freedom...
    PUMPKIN: and have a bright and happy future..{clr3}
  - {clr3}PUMPKIN: ...
    
    ONION: ...{clr3}
}
"""

DLG SPR_8
"""
{cycle
  - {clr3}there is a war coming... 
    
    we shall destroy all the humans.... 
    do you wish to join us?{clr3}
  - {clr3}walk into the fire... do not be afraid.....{clr3}
}
"""

DLG ITM_1
"""
{sequence
  - {clr2}..and now its time for bed, little one{clr2}
    {clr3}but grandma!!! you just got to the good part!!!{clr3}
    {clr2}i'll tell you the rest tomorrow but it's too late now{clr2}
    {clr3}b-but!!!!{clr3}
    
    {clr2}good night! {clr2}
  - 
}
"""

DLG ITM_2
"""
{sequence
  - {clr3}this is the {shk}pumpkin murderer's{shk} wagon... 
    {shk}I MUST RUN AWAY!!!!!!{shk}{clr3}
  - 
}
"""

END 0
...is this canon? who knows...

VAR a
